ingredients.ingredient: 1 (.4 ounce) packet dry vegetable soup mix
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

cookingTips: Thaw spinach completely and squeeze out excess moisture to prevent watery dip
Mix dip at least 2 hours ahead to allow flavors to develop
Hollow out the pumpernickel loaf and use the removed bread as dippers
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show the cook how to make a quick spinach dip, maximize spinach flavor by removing moisture, and create an impressive presentation using the bread bowl as serving vessel.
